column4: Hey does anyone know how to use rdesktop to connect to a windows PC that is on the same router as my ubuntu box?
if the win box is configured to let users remote connect, "rdesktop <host>" should work
I'm not exactly sure what to put for <host> though.  I know what the "name" of the computer should be.  is it just that, or do I have to have that in conjunction with a port number, etc...??
yes, that would be name (or ip)
